title: 3 test failures on Python 3.3
body:
```
[last: 0] marca@SCML-MarcA:~/dev/git-repos/jinja2$ PAGER=cat git log -n 1
commit a21f2edfc9536c918bae0ef654f9f3ffb1c2b508
Author: Christoph Zwerschke <cito@online.de>
Date:   Sun Oct 23 18:23:58 2011 +0200

    Fix typos.

ERROR: test_byte_compilation (jinja2.testsuite.loader.ModuleLoaderTestCase)
----------------------------------------------------------------------
Traceback (most recent call last):
  File "/Users/marca/dev/git-repos/jinja2/build/lib/jinja2/testsuite/loader.py", line 180, in test_byte_compilation

  File "/Users/marca/dev/git-repos/jinja2/build/lib/jinja2/environment.py", line 720, in get_template

  File "/Users/marca/dev/git-repos/jinja2/build/lib/jinja2/environment.py", line 694, in _load_template

  File "/Users/marca/dev/git-repos/jinja2/build/lib/jinja2/loaders.py", line 464, in load
```
